Select the Payment menu > Otherd > Virtual Account
Enter the 16 digit Virtual Account Number
Enter your Maybank ATM card and PIN
Select Transfer > CIMB Niaga Account / Rekening Ponsel Account > Other CIMB Niaga Account
Enter the Top Up Amount (minimum IDR 10,001).
Select YES/OK to approve the transaction
Enter the Top Up Amount (minimum IDR 10,001).
Select YES/OK to approve the transaction
Select a service provider Top Up Saldomu
Enter the Top Up Amount (minimum IDR 10,001).
Saldomu adalah aplikasi keuangan dengan fitur media sosial. Karena perbankan merupakan bagian dari kehidupan sosial anda.
SALDOMU is registered as MANUFACTURER OF FINANCIAL TECHNOLOGY at Bank Indonesia Number 20/85/DKSP/Srt/B dated March 8, 2018.
1. SALDOMU is only distributed through the Play Store and App Store by PT Mitra Pembayaran Elektronik.
2. Please DO NOT log in other media besides the official application to avoid any type of fraud in the name of SALDOMU.
3. If there are indications of fraud, please report to us via support@saldomu.com

PT. MITRA PEMBAYARAN ELEKTRONIK 
 Kantor Pusat :
 Ruko Villa Bukit Mas RE No. 7 
 Surabaya - 60225
Please choose a customer service based on the provider that you use to get the best service.

* Make sure that the email address listed is correct and active, because all your Saldomu transaction reports will be sent to that email address.

*Pastikan bahwa Nama Penerima yang Anda masukkan sudah benar.

Dengan ini saya menyatakan bahwa dokumen yang saya unggah adalah benar keabsahannya dan saya akan bertanggung jawab serta bersedia di hukum sesuai hukum yang berlaku jika di kemudian hari ditemukan ketidaksesuaian.
